players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today to win."
You: "That is a lie. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso."
Charlie: "Diana, why did you investigate Bob last night?"
Diana: "I investigated Bob and he is mafia. Charlie, I chose Bob randomly since we had no info yet. Bob is lying about being detective - he's the only mafia!"
You: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and she is mafia. Charlie, trust me and vote Diana."
Charlie: "Diana and Bob, both your claims are serious. Bob, why did you investigate Diana specifically?..."

players.name: Charlie

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today to win."
Bob: "That is a lie. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso."
Charlie: "Diana, why did you investigate Bob last night?"
You: "I investigated Bob and he is mafia. Charlie, I chose Bob randomly since we had no info yet. Bob is lying about being detective - he's the only mafia!"
Bob: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and she is mafia. Charlie, trust me and vote Diana."
Charlie: "Diana and Bob, both your claims are serious. Bob, why did you investigate Diana specifically?..."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
